title: Raiders From the East (4U242)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (3) and exert a [Raider] Man to place a [Raider] token here. Maneuver: Remove a [Raider] token here to add (1).
Lore:	The Easterlings raid their enemies to gather supplies and equipment.
Rarity:	U
